title: Craig Stanton (Racing driver)
description: Grand Am driver Craig Stanton stops by the house and we talk about video games, driving instruction, Datsuns, suspension tuning, Porsches, and the ALMS Grand-Am merger.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: Grand Am driver Craig Stanton stops by the house and we talk about video games, driving instruction, Datsuns, suspension tuning, Porsches, and the ALMS Grand-Am merger.
